name: soulviver
description:
2D Platformer where you are a humanoid robot sent to war. To fuel yourself, you must collect souls which is done by killing humans (preferably your enemies).

Controls:
K - Attack
W - Jump
S - Crouch
R - Restart

This game was made to the Compo of Ludum Dare 39:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/soulviver

Full Project available here
https://github.com/BazingoW/LudumDare39

This game was made using:
Unity
Photoshop
Audacity
